respStmt.name: Craig A. Berry, Martin Mueller, and Clifford Wulfman
Lawrence Berland, Hilary Bina, Katherine Gould, Kreg Segal, Nicholas Terrell

publicationStmt.p: The WordHoard Shakespeare is a joint project of the Perseus Project at Tufts University, The Northwestern University Library, and Northwestern University Academic Technologies. It is derived from The Globe Shakespeare , the one-volume version of the Cambridge Shakespeare , edited by W. G. Clark, J. Glover, and W. A. Wright (1891-3). The Internet Shakespeare editions of the quartos and folios have been consulted to create a modern text that observes as closely as possible the morphological and prosodic practices of the earliest editions. Spellings, especially of contracted and hyphenated forms, have been standardized across the corpus. The text has been fully lemmatized and morphosyntactically tagged.

© 2003. The copyright to The WordHoard Shakespeare is owned jointly by Northwestern University and Tufts University. The WordHoard Shakespeare is provided for free solely for non-commercial use by students, scholars, and the public. Any commercial use or publication of it, in whole or in part, without prior written authorization of the copyright holders is strictly prohibited.

sourceDesc.p: The Wordhoard Shakespeare is derived from, but not identical with, The Globe Shakespeare , the one-volume version of the Cambridge Shakespeare (1891-3) edited by W. G. Clark, J. Glover, and W. A. Wright.

castItem.roleDesc: a boy; a son to Page

div.head: Act 1, Scene 1
div.stage: Enter JUSTICE SHALLOW, SLENDER, and SIR HUGH EVANS.

sp.speaker: Page
sp.stage: Enter SIR JOHN FALSTAFF, BARDOLPH, NYM and PISTOL.

sp.speaker: Falstaff
sp.stage: Enter ANNE PACE, with wine; MISTRESS FORD and MISTRESS PAGE, following.

sp.speaker: Page
sp.stage: Exeunt all except Shal., Slen., and Evans.

div.head: Act 1, Scene 2
div.stage: Enter SIR HUGH EVANS and SIMPLE.

div.head: Act 1, Scene 3
div.stage: A room in the Garter Inn.
Enter FALSTAFF, HOST, BARDOLPH, NYM, PISTOL, and ROBIN.

div.head: Act 1, Scene 4
div.stage: A room in DOCTOR CAIUS'S house.
Enter MISTRESS QUICKLY, SIMPLE, and RUGBY.

div.head: Act 2, Scene 1
div.stage: Enter MISTRESS PAGE, with a letter.

sp.speaker: Mistress Page
sp.stage: Enter FORD with PISTOL, and PAGE with NYM.

sp.speaker: Page
sp.stage: Mrs. Page and Mrs. Ford come forward.

sp.speaker: Mistress Page
sp.stage: Exeunt Mrs. Page, Mrs. Ford, and Mrs. Quickly.

div.head: Act 2, Scene 2
div.stage: A room in the Garter Inn.

sp.speaker: Rugby
sp.stage: Enter HOST, SHALLOW, SLENDER, and PAGE.

div.head: Act 3, Scene 1
div.stage: Enter SIR HUGH EVANS and SIMPLE.

sp.speaker: Slender
sp.stage: Exeunt Shal., Slen., Page, and Host.

div.head: Act 3, Scene 2
div.stage: A street. Enter MISTRESS PAGE and ROBIN.

sp.speaker: Ford
sp.stage: Enter PAGE, SHALLOW, SLENDER, HOST, SIR HUGH EVANS, CAIUS, and RUGBY.

div.head: Act 3, Scene 3
div.stage: Enter MISTRESS FORD and MISTRESS PAGE.

sp.speaker: Falstaff
sp.stage: Gets into the basket; they cover him with foul linen.

sp.speaker: Mistress Ford
sp.stage: Enter FORD, PAGE, CAIUS, and SIR HUGH EVANS.

sp.speaker: Mistress Page
sp.stage: Re-enter FORD, PAGE, CAIUS, and SIR HUGH EVANS.

l.stage: Enter SHALLOW, SLENDER, and MISTRESS QUICKLY.

div.head: Act 3, Scene 5
div.stage: A room in the Garter Inn.

div.head: Act 4, Scene 1
div.stage: Enter MISTRESS PAGE, MISTRESS QUICKLY, and WILLIAM.

l.stage: Re-enter MISTRESS FORD with two Servants.

sp.speaker: First Servant
sp.stage: Enter FORD, PAGE, SHALLOW, CAIUS, and SIR HUGH EVANS.

sp.speaker: Ford
sp.stage: Pulling clothes out of the basket.

sp.speaker: Mistress Ford
sp.stage: Re-enter FALSTAFF in woman's clothes, and MISTRESS PAGE.

sp.speaker: Page
sp.stage: Exeunt Ford, Page, Shal., Caius, and Evans.

div.head: Act 4, Scene 3
div.stage: A room in the Garter Inn.

div.head: Act 4, Scene 4
div.stage: Enter PAGE, FORD, MISTRESS PAGE, MISTRESS FORD, and SIR HUGH EVANS.

div.head: Act 4, Scene 5
div.stage: A room in the Garter Inn.

div.head: Act 4, Scene 6
div.stage: Another room in the Garter Inn.

div.head: Act 5, Scene 1
div.stage: A room in the Garter Inn.

div.head: Act 5, Scene 3
div.stage: A street leading to the Park.
Enter MISTRESS PAGE, MISTRESS FORD, and DOCTOR CAIUS.

div.head: Act 5, Scene 4
div.stage: Enter SIR HUGH EVANS, disguised, with others as Fairies.

sp.speaker: Falstaff
sp.stage: Enter MISTRESS FORD and MISTRESS PAGE.

sp.speaker: Falstaff
sp.stage: Enter SIR HUGH EVANS, disguised as before; PISTOL, as Hobgoblin; MISTRESS QUICKLY, ANNE PAGE, and others, as Fairies, with tapers.

l.stage: They burn him with their tapers.

sp.stage: During this song they pinch FALSTAFF. DOCTOR CAIUS comes one way, and steals away a boy in green; SLENDER another way, and takes off a boy in white; and FENTON comes, and steals away MRS ANNE PAGE. A noise of hunting is heard within. All the Fairies run away. FALSTAFF pulls off his buck's head, and rises.
Enter PAGE, FORD, MISTRESS PAGE and MISTRESS FORD.
